fields.capital_expenditure_1: PRJ000545 EH SOUTH BLDG AHU UPGRADES (
fields.capital_expenditure_2: PRJ000520 C150213EV EH Labor & Delivery Refu
fields.capital_expenditure_5: PRJ000251 EH21-4 ACIST contrast del sys
fields.capital_expenditure_6: PRJ000639 C220314EV EH SPD CART WASHER
fields.facility_diversity_comments: We are not able to provide information on total capital spend with diverse suppliers, we use a third party tool for diverse spend and working with them to improve it for future years. The diverse supplier figures shared below are representative of large construction projects.
fields.planned_diversity_expenditures: Capital equipment, General and subcontracted services, material suppliers and consultants. For each RFP we solicit from the vendor community we strive to include diverse suppliers if available, if we are using a general contractor for a construction project we push the partners to include a share of diverse supplier utilization overall. However, we do not have goals for specific spend per type of diverse supplier and still in the earlier stages of rolling this out across the system.
fields.plan_for_diversity_recruitment: Invitations to bid and bid forms alert prospective vendors to the participation goals of the organization and bid recommendations include this information for the owner teams to review in advance of award.  We are actively using Supplier Gateway and published that to the vendor community. We are also in the midst of redesigning our external website with the name change and plan to include a spot to share information with the supplier community and specifically the diverse supplier community. Announcing our bid schedule and potential projects for them to bid on.
fields.challenges_to_diversity_recruitment: Due to the nature of construction projects executed within the healthcare environment, only experienced contractors are considered to perform work within these sensitive environments.  With the current state of the Chicgoland market, most qualified labor has been engaged in large projects making them unavailable or unfavorable economically. Capital equipment is generally selected by clinicians with familiarity with the equipment and many large vendors have strong relationships with clinicians.  Most diverse suppliers costs incrementally more than non diverse suppliers. With our margin being so meager as an organization we have to find the win/win solutions where a diverse suppliers can be a lower cost provider and help the community.
fields.hsfrb_assistance: Invest in encouraging talent recruitment and development.  Need to get these diverse suppliers on par with their competitors from a depth and sophistication perspective.  Invest funds in the diverse suppliers in our community to lower their operating costs that would improve their costs to us going forward. Or provide a grant to organizations like ours to subsidize the cost increase of diverse suppliers.
fields.certifications:
Recognized organizations include:
1. Local or national minority supplier development councils.
2. Woman owned business development centers.
3. Local, State or Federal government agencies.
4. Nationally recognized   chamber of commerce, e.g.
fields.point_of_contact: Contact should be made through the Supply Chain Category management team or in response to a bid request
fields.enrollment_process: In working with the Category management team, the vendor/supplier will provide documentation if selected as an approved vendor or they will be recognized in our 3rd party tool.
fields.examples_of_successes:
As an owner, we look to many of the general contractors in the Chicagoland area and discuss those diverse partnerships they have formed.  Many of the general contractors have forged both relationships and programs to help elevate the work product being provided.  Additionally, there are many diverse suppliers who have grown from being material passthrough suppliers to active performers of work – capitalizing on these existing relationships and extending the breadth of scope for those same vendors has been beneficial to all parties.



Endeavor health shifted hand hygiene portfolio to GOJO due to good pricing and women owned status.
